error.confirm-not-match: Passwords do not match. User password not updated.

show-user-context-menu.name: Show user context menu item.
show-user-context-menu.hint: Display an item in the users list right click menu.

expose-dialog-function.name: Add showDialog() function to main game object.
expose-dialog-function.hint: Allows macros or scripts to call game.updateYourPassword.showDialog().
